articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Contest of Air Commanding Officers of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Contest of Air Commanding Officers of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un guided the "2015 combat aeronautics contest of air commanding officers of the Air and Anti-Air Force of the Korean People's Army" which was held with splendor at the Kalma Airport, which has been rebuilt on an expansion basis, to mark the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the great war for protecting the country.
					 At 8:30, a.m. his plane Chammae-1 flew over the air above the airport to review sub-units of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force.
					
					 After alighting from the plane, he received a salute from the head of the guards of honor of the KPA Ground, Navy, Air and Anti-Air Force and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and reviewed them.
					
					 He received bunches of flowers from service personnel of the KPA Ground, Navy and Air and Anti-Air Force.
					
					 KPA Army General Ri Yong Gil, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, made an opening speech.
					
					 Ri said that the "2015 combat aeronautics contest of air commanding officers of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force," the second in the seven decades-long history of the Juche-oriented air force, is a significant training contest to be held according to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un to reliably prepare all the air commanding officers and combat pilots as a-match-for-a-hundred all-round pilots possessed of high aeronautics in the crucible of the training revolution.
					
					 Ri declared the contest open.
					
					 Kim Jong Un gave a sortie order to air commanding officers and combat pilots.
					
					 The contest was divided into the group of commanding officers and group of units. Air commanding officers and combat pilots skillfully conducted various air combat flight actions including assault flight, buzzing and special flying skill, fully demonstrating their aeronautics cultivated in their day-to-day training.
					
					 He was greatly satisfied to watch their intensive flight drill. 
					
					 Air commanding officers and combat pilots satisfactorily conducted various combat flight actions at the contest which continued in the afternoon.
					
					 He noted that aeronautics of air commanding officers and combat pilots have remarkably improved as compared with last year.
					
					 He said the contest organized on the occasion of the significant v-day is aimed to encourage the whole army to steadfastly carry forward the heroic fighting sprit and stamina of the generation which won victory in the war and bring about a radical turn in the drills to round off preparations for a war full of the will to settle with arms accounts with the U.S. imperialists, the chieftain of aggression, and the south Korean puppet group keen to escalate the confrontation with the fellow countrymen and that of social systems, seized with sycophancy toward the U.S. 
					
					 The results of the contest held in the morning and afternoon were summed up to decide standings.
					
					 The chief of the KPA General Staff made a speech at a prize awarding ceremony and announced the results of the contest.
					
					 The director of the General Political Bureau and other commanding officers of the KPA awarded prizes to the successful officers and units. The chief of the KPA General Staff declared the contest closed. 
					
					 Watching the contest were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil, So Hong Chan, Jo Kyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol, O Kum Chol, Ri Yong Ju, Choe Yong Ho, Kim Rak Gyom and other commanding officers of the KPA, senior officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, exemplary combat pilots of the Air and Anti-Air Force of the KPA and the soldier-builders who participated in the construction project.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Fourth National Conference of War Veterans
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Fourth National Conference of War Veterans
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the participants in the Fourth National Conference of War Veterans in front of the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery.
					 He arrived at the photographing venue and waved back the cheering war veterans, extending warm greetings to them.
					
					 After the photographing he expressed belief that all the war veterans would hand superb ideological and spiritual wealth over to the coming generations as laudable revolutionary elders and educators who instill the spirit of death-defying defence of the country in the ranks of their successors marching forward towards final victory of the Korean revolution, and thus positively contribute to arming them with the spirit of defending the country.
					
					 Present at the photo session were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil, Ri Ul Sol, Hwang Sun Hui, Kim Chol Man, Pak Kyong Suk, Ri Yong Suk, Yang Hyong Sop, Ri Yong Mu, O Kuk Ryol, Choe Yong Rim and Thae Jong Su.

articles.title: FM Spokesman Urges U.S. to Show Its Sincere "Will for Dialogue"
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Urges U.S. to Show Its Sincere "Will for Dialogue" 
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Wednesday gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA as regards the fact that the U.S. is working hard to shift the blame for the stalled dialogue over the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula on to the DPRK at any cost:
					 Visiting south Korea and its surrounding countries from July 25, the special envoy for the six-party talks of the U.S. State of Department is misleading the public opinion to give impression that the dialogue has not been resumed due to the DPRK, asserting that the U.S. is keeping the door of dialogue open but the DPRK is reluctant to come out for dialogue and if the DPRK makes a decision to go other way, the U.S. would flexibly react to it.
					
					 As can be judged by anyone with reason, the escalated tension without dialogue persists on the Korean peninsula due to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK, the ceaseless joint military maneuvers for aggression, its military expression, in particular.
					
					 If the U.S., not the DPRK, stops such hostile acts as joint military maneuvers and makes a decision to go other way, it will be possible to resume dialogue and settle many issues.
					
					 It is the height of shamelessness and hypocrisy that the U.S. is trumpeting about "will for dialogue" and "flexibility" while resorting to military maneuvers ceaselessly.
					
					 This is nothing but a petty trick to shift the blame for the stalled dialogue on to the DPRK in a bid to tide over the crisis when the public in the U.S. is becoming increasingly vocal blaming the Obama administration's failed policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The evil cycle of tension will persist and dialogue will not be held before the U.S. shows its much-touted sincere "will for dialogue" by stopping the joint military maneuvers.

articles.title: Korean Reverend in Canada Confesses to Subversive Plots against DPRK
articles.content:
Korean Reverend in Canada Confesses to Subversive Plots against DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Rim Hyon Su, Korean reverend in Canada, was interviewed at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday.
					 Rev. Rim was accused of making subversive plots and activities against the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, Korean media persons and those of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, foreign correspondents, staff members of diplomatic missions here and overseas Koreans staying in the socialist homeland.
					
					 The DPRK's law enforcement organ arrested Rim who acted as a servant of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group. He malignantly hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership and social system of the DPRK and resorted to subversive plots and activities in a sinister bid to build a religious state in the DPRK while frequenting it under the guise of "humanitarian aid" and "free donation" over the past 18 years. 
					
					 He confessed to all his crimes in the course of the investigation by the competent organ. 
					
					 He spoke first at the press conference.
					
					 He illegally entered Pyongyang via Rason City in violation of the DPRK's emergency measure to prevent the spread of Ebola in last February. He is, therefore, under legal investigation by the DPRK's relevant organ.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 I have so far malignantly defamed the dignity and social system of the DPRK, pursuant to the scenario of the U.S. and the south Korean regime, visiting the DPRK under the signboard of "humanitarian aid", "free donation" and "cooperation". 
					
					 I delivered a "report on what is going on in north Korea" before tens of thousands of south Koreans and overseas Koreans at sermon on Sundays at my church and during preaching tours of more than 20 countries including Canada, the U.S., south Korea, Japan and Brazil. Each time I malignantly slandered the dignity and social system of the DPRK.
					
					 At various kinds of religious meetings including Kimnet, a group of leaders of overseas compatriot church and missionary organization in North America, and the world's south Koreans missionary meeting, I made preachment and gave lectures that "north Korea should be collapsed with the love of 'God'. 
					
					 I persistently conducted anti-DPRK missionary activities in a bid to collapse the worship for the leader to be kept in the hearts of the people in the north and disintegrate and destroy it from within.
					
					 I made sure that food jutes donated to different parts of the DPRK were intentionally drawn the Cross and used to send them written on church name and bible phrases and clauses.
					
					 I went round different parts of the DPRK in the name of "supporting" in a bid to overturn its social system by taking advantage of the hostile policy against it sought by the south Korean authorities and set up a base for building a religious state.
					
					I fanned up distrust and hostility toward the DPRK upon churchmen and the society of compatriots with fabrication and false propaganda.
					
					 I sent despicable photos he has taken in the DPRK in a secret way to my son. I made sure that my son made opposition literature including video titled "North's reality" and briefed on the fact before churchmen and posted it on his website. 
					
					 I secretly photographed the old bible and hymns of So Kye Ok, Korean living in Los Angels, in around 2007 and committed such fraud that I collected them from people of the DPRK believing in religion.
					
					 I took active part in the operations of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to lure and abduct DPRK citizens and in their programs for "aiding defectors from the north."
					
					 When meeting the U.S. ambassador to Mongolia in 1996 I discussed the issue of helping over 500 "defectors from the north" go to south Korea via Mongolia every year. I received a GPS marking an area of the boarder of Inner Mongolia, China from Dennis Kim, south Korean in the U.S., involved in alluring "defectors from the north", and handed it to a "Korean broker defected from the north" at Beijing Airport.
					
					 I made annual outlay for supporting "defectors from the  north" from the church budget for two years since 1996 and dispatched Canadian believer Jon Jong Sok to Yanji and Tumen areas in Jilin Province of China to allure DPRK citizens to "defecting."
					
					 Rim Hyon Su honestly admitted all crimes perpetrated by him were aimed to overthrow the state.
					
					 He answered questions raised by reporters.
					
					 He referred to how he was checked and arrested by a law enforcement organ of the DPRK and laid bare the vicious and hypocritical nature of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' moves against the DPRK.
					 According to him, the U.S. and south Korean authorities are hurling not only politicians but all tricksters, media and websites into noisy propaganda about the "nuclear issue of the north" and the "human rights issue of the north". They are terming the DPRK a "country proliferating WMDs", "country suspected of money laundering" and "country manufacturing biological weapons". 
					
					 The "report of the UN Commission of Inquiry on Human Rights in the North" through which the U.S., the south Korean authorities and the West are vociferating about the "human rights issue of the north" was cooked up on the basis of false testimonies made by such human scum as Sin Tong Hyok who fled after committing crimes in the north. They bribed "experts" on Korean issues and egged them on to let loose a spate of invectives against the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. and its allied countries and south Korean authorities are strictly barring goods for civilians, even a gram of food and fertilizers from being exported to the DPRK.
					
					 He exposed church organizations and persons engrossed in false propaganda and conspiratorial activities against the DPRK, pursuant to the policies of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces. He deeply repented of his wrongdoings, adding he committed crimes against the DPRK, prompted by his wrong understanding of it.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets King of Morocco
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets King of Morocco
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Thursday sent a message of greeting to Mohamed Ⅵ, king of Morocco, on its national day.
					 The message expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms and sincerely wished the king and people of Morocco greater successes in their work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Nigerian Ambassador
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Nigerian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong met and had a talk with Nigerian Ambassador to the DPRK Nwofe Alexander who paid a farewell call on him on Thursday.

articles.title: Kang Sok Ju Meets Vietnamese Delegation
articles.content:
Kang Sok Ju Meets Vietnamese Delegation
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Kang Sok Ju, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with a delegation of the Vietnamese newspaper Nhan Dan led by Deputy Editor-in-Chief Phan Huy Hien on Thursday.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets President of World Chess Federation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets President of World Chess Federation
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Kirsan Ilyumzhinov, president of the World Chess Federation, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from President of World Chess Federation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from President of World Chess Federation
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Kirsan Ilyumzhinov, president of the World Chess Federation, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was conveyed to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, by the president of the federation on Thursday.

articles.title: Pyongyang Mass Rally Held
articles.content:
Pyongyang Mass Rally Held 
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Pyongyangites met at Kim Il Sung Square Thursday to respond to the appeal the participants in the 4th National Conference of War Veterans sent to all service personnel, people and youth.
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, Kwak Pom Gi, and vice-premiers of the Cabinet, officials of ministries and national institutions, officials of the party and administrative and working people's organizations, institutions, industrial establishments and farms, heroes, persons of merits and other people from all walks of life in the city.
					
					 Kim Su Gil, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, read out the appeal.
					
					 Then, representatives of working class, agricultural workers and youth and students took the floor to take their pledges.
					
					 They expressed their determination to demonstrate the heroic spirit and stamina of the citizens in the capital city in the anti-U.S. showdown and in the general offensive for bringing about the final victory in building a thriving nation by learning from the veterans' revolutionary faith and spirit of defending the country.
					
					 They said that they would devotedly defend the Party Central Committee with an unshakable faith that the country's reunification and the building of a thriving nation are sure to be achieved thanks to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, and take the lead in producing the heroic epic of great Kim Jong Un's era and the new myth of Songun Korea's victory with proud successes of production and construction.
					
					 They said they would regard their units and working sites as Raktonggang front and Height 1211 in flames and give full play to the spirit of defending the country and indomitable fighting spirit displayed in the 1950s on all fronts of building an economic power. 
					
					 They would become fortresses and shields in devotedly defending Kim Jong Un, their destiny and future, just as members of bodyguard company devotedly defended Supreme Commander Kim Il Sung amid intensive bombing by the enemies during the war, they said.
					
					 They stressed the need to become human bullets and bombs if Kim Jong Un issues an order, and thus wipe out those aggressors to the last one so that not a single man would be left to sign a surrender document.

articles.title: Birthday Party Given for War Veterans
articles.content:
Birthday Party Given for War Veterans 
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A birthday party of participants in the 4th National Conference of War Veterans was given at the April 25 Hotel on Thursday. 
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Jo Yon Jun, and officials of the party and armed forces organs and participants in the conference who observe their birthdays during the conference. 
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae in a speech said that the loving care repeatedly shown by Marshal Kim Jong Un represents his trust and expectation that the war veterans would glorify their life in the road of the Juche revolution, Songun revolution in the spirit they displayed in the wartime. 
					
					 He called upon the war veterans to be faithful to the leadership of the Marshal as they did in the past and make positive efforts to hand down the spirit of defending the country displayed in the 1950s as a precious legacy to posterity, just as they remained loyal to the party and the leader.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Kirsan Ilyumzhinov, president of the World Chess Federation, and his party and other foreign guests visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 At the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state they made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the hall where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: War Veterans Meet with Youth and Students in Pyongyang
articles.content:
War Veterans Meet with Youth and Students in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 4th National Conference of War Veterans met with youth and students in Pyongyang at Kim Il Sung University and the Central Youth Hall on Thursday.
					 When the participants of the conference arrived at the venues of the meetings, youth and students warmly welcomed them. 
					
					 Participants said in their speeches that there are many countries and each of them have war veterans but it is only war veterans in the DPRK who are held up as the generation dedicated to the revolution and respected by the people.
					
					 They told stories about the exploits they performed by winning victories in the battles to defend the country from the U.S. imperialist aggressors, true to the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They ardently appealed to the youth and students to turn out in the confrontation with imperialism and the U.S. in a do-or-die spirit and build a thriving reunified country on this land.
					
					 Youth and students renewed their determinations to bring about July 27, the day of the final victory, without fail by giving fullest play to the spirit and might of the Korean youth and dynamism of a youthful power.
					
					 Present at the meeting were officials of the youth league, youth and students in Pyongyang.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals, Officials
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals, Officials
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were conferred on intellectuals and officials who made contributions to the building of a socialist economic power and a highly civilized country.
					 The title of candidate academician went to Ri Yong Sik, teacher of Pyongyang University of Railways, and Choe Chang Sik, director of the Public Health Administration Institute.
					
					 Professorship was awarded to 10 persons including An Myong Hun, department head of Kim Il Sung University, and Jo Son Hwa, department head of Kim Chol Ju University of Education.
					
					 Doctorate was conferred on Yu Hyo Gun, teacher of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, Pak Song Ho, department head of Kim Il Sung University, Ri Kang Hae, department head of Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, Yang Hye Yong, teacher of Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry, and other persons and associate professorship to 182 persons.
					
					 A ceremony of awarding the academic degrees and titles took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday.

articles.title: Open-air Sports Ground Opens
articles.content:
Open-air Sports Ground Opens
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- An open-air sports ground was created in the Munsu area of embassies which opened with due ceremony on Thursday.
					 It has a stadium for playing various games including basketball, volleyball and tennis, and the spectators' stand and amusement facilities. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were officials of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps and members of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here.
					
					 Sim Kuk Ryong, general director of the above-said bureau, said that foreigners would make positive contribution to the development of friendly relations among the countries while doing exercises in the ground.
					
					 Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, doyen of the diplomatic corps here, said that the ceremony offered a good occasion for strengthening the bond of friendship among countries.
					
					 There took place a volleyball game between the team of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps and the team of the diplomatic corps.

articles.title: Results of 2015 ITTF World Tour in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Results of 2015 ITTF World Tour in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The GAC Group 2015 ITTF World Tour Challenge Series-Pyongyang Open began here on Wednesday.
					 Its group league matches in senior and U-21 men's and women's singles came to an end on Thursday.
					
					 Following are the results of group league matches:
					
					 - Paddlers who advanced into the 16 superstar tournament in senior men's and women's singles

					Women's singles -- Ri Myong Sun, Ri Mi Gyong, Kim Hye Song, Kim Song I, Kim Mun Yong, Kim Nam Hae, Ri Hyon Sim, Cha Hyo Sim, Yu Yong Sun and Ri Pok Hyang from DPRK

					 Edric Lim Zheng Jie and Maxxe Tay Ming Han from Singapore
						
					
					Women's singles -- Kim Song I, Cha Hyo Sim, Kim Jin Ju, Kim Ryon Mi, Kim Jin Hyang, Kim Nam Hae, Kim Sol Song and Jong Un Ju from DPRK.

articles.title: Performance Given by State Merited Chorus Continues
articles.content:
Performance Given by State Merited Chorus Continues
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus performs before full houses here every day to celebrate the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The performance began with serial songs "July 27, Our Victory Day". Put on the stage were male solo and chorus "Three Years of War", male chorus "We Shall Be Immortal Defending the Country's Seas", male chorus and orchestra "Mungyong Pass" and other numbers.
					
					 Performers sang high praises of the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung in winning the victory in the war.
					
					 Also put on the stage were wartime songs depicting the mental spirit and optimism displayed by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in the flames of the war.
					
					 The repertoire included numbers reflecting all the service personnel and people to accomplish to the last the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The performance was enjoyed by officials of ministries and national institutions and other people on Thursday.

articles.title: Performance of 20th National Art Festival of Women's Union Given
articles.content:
Performance of 20th National Art Festival of Women's Union Given
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- There took place a performance of the 20th National Art Festival of the Women's Union at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Thursday. 
					 The performers made a successful artistic representation of the pride and happiness of the Korean women, who grew up to be powerful force pushing one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot under the care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful pieces including chorus "Joy of the People," serial songs "Great Love of the Mother," immortal famous work "Azalea," dialogic poem "Blessings of Love" and oungum ensemble "We Cannot Live without You." 
					
					 The performers impressively represented thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un for bringing up Korean women to be revolutionaries of the Songun era true to the intention of the President and Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul for the development of the Korean women's movement. 
					
					 They also staged numbers reflecting the high spiritual world and revolutionary optimism of the women's union members displaying patriotism in the general offensive to glorify the 70th anniversaries of the liberation of Korea and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea with great successes. 
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop, officials concerned, women's union officials, women of merits and other members of the women's union in the city.

articles.title: New Books Published in DPRK
articles.content:
New Books Published in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- 30 kinds of new books have been brought out by the Art and Literature Publishing House in the DPRK this year.
					 Among them are a collection of revolutionary legends, a collection of poems and full-length novels.
					
					 The book "Crane in Kumsusan" (volume for legends associated with the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun) carries a photo of President Kim Il Sung writing the reminiscences and photo-accompanied revolutionary legends popular among servicepersons and people.
					
					 The collection of poems titled "Song of Legends Praising the Sun of Songun" is composed of six chapters, which poetically deals with the revolutionary anecdotes associated with the great personality of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Full-length novel "Lucky Fellow on Battlefields" takes its plot from the feats performed by Ri Hak Mun, who was awarded the title of twice DPRK Hero, and other scouts of the Korean People's Army during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Among newly published books include collection of short stories "Bosom of the Sun" and historical novel "In Defence of Ancestral Land".

articles.title: Loving Care Shown by Great Persons for Women Weavers
articles.content:
Loving Care Shown by Great Persons for Women Weavers
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Today (July 30) marks the 69th anniversary of the Law on Sex Equality in the DPRK.
					 On this day, women workers of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill are recalling with deep emotion the leadership feats performed by the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime gave on-the-spot guidance to the mill on 48 occasions after he appointed the site for the mill in October Juche 37 (1948).
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il in his lifetime visited the mill several times and clearly indicated the way to be followed by the mill, taking warm care of the living of its women weavers.
					
					 On July 30, 2009, he came to the mill to congratulate them on the 63rd anniversary of the Law on Sex Equality.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the mill in October 2013 and gave a promise to its women weavers that he would take it upon himself to build a new hostel for them at the mill.
					
					 Later, he visited the mill to inspect the completed hostel and suggested holding a big banquet as well as setting birthday spreads for workers in the hostel on May Day.
					
					 When visiting the mill again in December last year, he praised its workers for increasing production and left his autograph reading "Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill".
					
					 Encouraged by his loving care, women workers of the mill are directing all their efforts to increased production.

articles.title: Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill
articles.content:
Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 69th anniversary of the promulgation of the Law on Sex Equality (July 30, 1946).
					 Women workers of the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill are significantly greeting the day with increased production.
					
					 In this regard, KCNA met Ju Wol Hyang, workshop head of the mill.
					
					 She said:
					
					 The mill has achieved great achievements under the guidance of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu. Thanks to their loving care for women, the mill turned into a model unit where the cultured practice is established in production and life.
					
					 It introduced over 100 technical innovations in production, overfulfilling its yearly quota every year.
					
					 It has a room for online education provided by Tele-education College under Kim Chaek University of Technology and a scientific and technological disseminating room for employees.
					
					 It also runs welfare facilities, nursery and kindergarten for women workers, who are holding a majority of its employees.
					
					 To hand down to posterity the immortal leadership exploits performed by anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk in developing the silk-reeling industry, the mill was renamed Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill in July Juche 98 (2009), under a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Papers Call on Korean Women to Demonstrate Revolutionary Spirit
articles.content:
Papers Call on Korean Women to Demonstrate Revolutionary Spirit
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Papers Thursday dedicate editorials to the 69th anniversary of the Law on Sex Equality promulgated by President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 Thanks to this historic day, the Korean women could take part in social activities as proud mistresses of society with the equal rights with men and could push one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot from the first period of building a new country.
					
					 Nearly 70-year-long history covered by the Korean women is shining as the militant route as they demonstrated their might as a powerful force of the revolution and construction, holding in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il generation after generation. 
					
					 The proud history covered by the Juche-oriented women's movement is a brilliant one characterized by importance and respect given to women by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean women, who are carrying forward the noble spiritual world of the anti-Japanese women fighters under the wise leadership and warm care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, have successfully carried out their mission before the era and history, remaining loyal to the party and the leader with loyalty in every annal of the revolution, notably the period of building a new country and the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The Korean women devoted their warm patriotism in the fierce flames of the great Chollima upswing which the leader and the people kindled together in one mind and intention. They also devoted their precious blood and sweat to building monumental edifices of eternal value and making a leap forward for the prosperity of the country.
					
					 They have defended Korean-style socialism while tightening their belts and looking after their families and collective in the period of the arduous march, the forced march.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all women to get united around Marshal Kim Jong Un and fully demonstrate the revolutionary stamina of the Korean women in the era of Songun in the present general offensive for hastening the final victory.

articles.title: KCTU Calls for Struggling for Peace
articles.content:
KCTU Calls for Struggling for Peace
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) made public a statement titled "Let us advance toward putting end to war state between the north and the U.S. and concluding peace agreement on the Korean peninsula" on July 27.
					 The 1953 Armistice Agreement led to a ceasefire on the peninsula but peace agreement has not been signed, the statement said.
					
					 The Korean peninsula needs a conclusion of peace agreement, not anthrax germ and THAAD, it noted.
					
					 KCTU will wage positive actions for peace through the conclusion of peace agreement, it stressed.

articles.title: Number of Suicides Increases at U.S. Universities
articles.content:
Number of Suicides Increases at U.S. Universities
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Six students committed suicide at Pennsylvania University in recent ten odd months, according to the south Korean paper Hankook Ilbo on July 28.
					 Four students also committed suicide at a university of the U.S. this year.
					
					 The number of suicides is increasing at New York University and other universities.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Calls for Achieving Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Nation
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Calls for Achieving Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Nation
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference before the Taejon City Office building on July 27, calling for pulling the U.S. forces out of south Korea and achieving independent and peaceful reunification of the nation, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 Speakers said that the U.S. is reinforcing military capabilities on the Korean peninsula and working hard to tighten military alliance with Japan and repeat the history of aggression.
					
					 As for the case of the introduction of anthrax germs into south Korea the U.S. is moving to distort the truth about it, far from making an apology, and the present "government" is working to connive at it, far from probing the truth, they deplored.
					
					 They called for putting an end to the state of cease-fire and concluding a peace agreement at an early date for the existence and prosperity of the Korean nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Protests Japan's Shameless Move
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Protests Japan's Shameless Move
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea staged an action in Japan in protest against the shameless move of Japan rushing headlong into the road of reinvasion of Korea.
					 There took place a rally outside the building of the Japanese Diet on July 26. Attending it were members of the above-said body and 25,000 Japanese citizens.
					
					 Speakers condemned Japan for railroading the security bills which encourage Japan "Self-Defense Forces" to exercise the "right to collective self-defense".
					
					 The Japanese government and media are describing the bills as the "law for security" in a bid to distort the essence of aggression but they are the ones for war from every aspect, they charged.

articles.title: Koreans in China Meet War Veterans
articles.content:
Koreans in China Meet War Veterans
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China sponsored round-table talks with war veterans in Shenyang, China on July 27, the 62nd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Present there were officials of the association, members of the Korean Aged Men Association in Shenyang City and veterans of the Chinese People's Volunteers (CPV) who entered the Korean front.
					
					 Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the association, in a speech said that the victory in the war on July 27 was an event to be specially recorded in the 20th century as the DPRK honorably displayed the dignity of the country and nation in the sacred war against imperialism and the U.S.
					
					 The CPV fought together the Korean people against aggressors during the Fatherland Liberation War, she noted, adding:
					
					 The signing of the Armistice Agreement was surrender for the U.S. imperialists as they bent their keens before the Korean people, and it was also a defeat of the imperialist allied forces.
					
					 CPV veterans said that no one could match the Korean people who turned out as one under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung to beat back the U.S. imperialist aggressors.
					
					 A reception was given in celebration of the anniversary on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK's War Victory Day Marked in China
articles.content:
DPRK's War Victory Day Marked in China
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held round-table talks in Shenyang on July 27 on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the association, said that the service personnel of the heroic Korean People's Army and other people turned out as one in the struggle for defending the dignity of the country and honor of the nation under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, outstanding strategist and peerlessly brilliant commander, and thus won a victory in the Fatherland Liberation War by smashing the aggressors headed by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Choe Su Bong, vice-chairman of the association, lauded the President for setting forth the original strategies and tactics unrecorded in the world war history and leading the Fatherland Liberation War to the brilliant victory.
					
					 Speakers said that nobody could match the Korean people who turned out as one under the leadership of the President to defeat the U.S. imperialist aggressors.
					
					 They said the U.S. imperialists which suffered bitter defeats by the Korean people in the war are still clinging to the moves to provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK, far from drawing a due lesson.
					
					 They affirmed that the DPRK would certainly emerge victorious in the confrontation with the U.S. as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Forcibly Detaining DPRK Residents
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Forcibly Detaining DPRK Residents
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK issued a joint statement on July 23 in denunciation of the south Korean authorities for forcibly detaining DPRK residents.
					 The statement said that five crewmen of DPRK went unexpectedly adrift toward the area of the south side due to engine trouble and demanded them be sent back to DPRK.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 But the south Korean puppet forces forcibly detained three of them and even declined their demand to meet their family members.
					
					 It is a crude violation of the DPRK's sovereignty and the right of its citizens as well as another heinous provocation against it. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities made foolish calculation to use the accident for defaming the image of the DPRK.
					
					 We strongly demand the south Korean puppet authorities unconditionally send those forcibly detained residents of the DPRK back to where their parents and families wait.

articles.title: Tajik Political Figure Warns U.S. Not to Forget July 27
articles.content:
Tajik Political Figure Warns U.S. Not to Forget July 27
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- If the U.S. does not repeal its hostile policy toward the DPRK but persists in anti-DPRK moves, it will meet another July 27.
					 Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, said this in a statement on July 24 on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 He said that under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, outstanding strategist and iron-willed commander, the army and people of the DPRK inflicted a serious defeat upon the U.S. which provoked a war in Korea.
					
					 The statement continued:
					
					 The U.S. suffered a defeat for the first time in its history of wars and could not but signed the Korean Armistice Agreement on July 27, 1953.
					
					 But failing to draw a bitter lesson from the war, the U.S. persists in the wildcat moves to outstrip the DPRK militarily.
					
					 The DPRK is now demonstrating its might as a country capable of manufacturing and launching satellites and also as a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.

articles.title: Ethiopian, Swedish Bodies Accuse S. Korean Authorities of Detaining DPRK's Residents
articles.content:
Ethiopian, Swedish Bodies Accuse S. Korean Authorities of Detaining DPRK's Residents
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Ethiopian and Swedish bodies issued statements on July 24 and 25 in denunciation of the south Korean authorities for detaining DPRK's residents.
					 The Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that the DPRK strongly demanded the south Korean authorities repatriate its residents adrift without delay but they are keeping three of five residents under forced detention while talking about "defection" even though they were accidentally adrift in the sea, and ignoring their family members' demand for a face-to-face meeting.
					
					 The body said the detention is a wanton violation of the DPRK's sovereignty and citizens' rights.
					
					 It bitterly denounced the south Korean authorities for committing the crime against the nation and humanity. 
					
					 The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association also denounced the south Korean authorities for committing the crime against humanity and demanded that the DPRK residents be sent back to their families.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige competencia de pilotaje de miembros de mando de fuerzas aereas de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige competencia de pilotaje de miembros de mando de fuerzas aereas de EPC
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio la Competencia de pilotaje de combate de los miembros de mando de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del Ejercito Popular de Corea-2015, efectuada en el aeropuerto de Kalma reconstruido y amplificado con motivo del 62o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					A las ocho y media de la manana, el avion especial "Azor No. 1" con el Mariscal a su bordo volo sobre el aeropuerto de Kalma pasando revista a las subunidades aereas de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC.
					
					Tras recibir en el terreno el parte de recepcion del jefe de la guardia de honor, el Mariscal paso revista a la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino.
					
					Los militares de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC le dieron ramos de flores.
					
					El discurso inaugural estuvo a cargo del general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC, Ri Yong Gil, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC.
					
					El orador dijo que la competencia se realiza por segunda vez en la historia de 70 anos de las autoctonas fuerzas aereas segun el noble proposito del Mariscal de formar en medio de las practicas revolucionarias a todos los miembros de mando y los aviadores como fidedignos y excelentes pilotos listos para pelear uno contra cien enemigos. 
					
					Y declaro la apertura de la competencia.
					
					Kim Jong Un dio la orden de salida a los miembros de mando y los aviadores.
					
					En la competencia dividida en los grupos de oficiales y de unidades, los aviadores mostraron sin reservas sus aeronauticas adiestradas ordinariamente con diversos vuelos de combate como el vuelo de asalto, vuelo a ras de tierra y vuelo de habilidad especial.
					
					Mirando con atencion los ejercicios de vuelo de los aviadores, el Mariscal expreso gran satisfaccion. 
					
					En la competencia que continuo hasta la tarde, los navegadores cumplieron excelentemente diversos movimientos de vuelo.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que la aeronautica de los pilotos se ha perfeccionado mas que en el ano pasado.
					
					Subrayo que la competencia fue organizada con motivo del dia de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria para que siguiendo al pie de la letra el espiritu y el temperamento de la lucha heroica de los integrantes de la generacion de la guerra, se levante en todo el ejercito el fervor de entrenamiento para perfeccionar los preparativos de guerra con la firme decision de saldar sin falta la cuenta final con fusiles al imperialismo norteamericano, caudillo de agresion y a los titeres surcoreanos proyanquis que recurren con mas frenesi a la confrontacion fratricida y de regimenes.
					
					Se sumaron las notas de la manana y la tarde y se clasifico el rango.
					
					Luego de discurso de premiacion del jefe del EMG del EPC, se presento el resultado de la competencia.
					
					El jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC y otros miembros de mando del EPC premiaron a los navegadores y las unidades sobresalientes y termino la competencia con el discurso clausural del jefe del EMG del EPC.
					
					Presenciaron la competencia Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil, So Hong Chan, Jo Kyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol, O Kum Chol, Ri Yong Ju, Choe Yong Ho, Kim Rak Gyom y otros miembros de mando del EPC, los funcionarios directivos del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los pilotos de combate ejemplares de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC, asi como los constructores militares movilizados en la reconstruccion y la amplificacion del aeropuerto de Kalma.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un toma foto con participantes en IV Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un toma foto con participantes en IV Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio junto con los participantes en la IV Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos ante el Cementerio de Martires Participantes en la Guerra de la Liberacion de la Patria. .
					Llegado al lugar de filmacion, el Mariscal envio cordial saludo a los veteranos respondiendo a las efusivas aclamaciones de ellos.
					
					Terminada la filmacion, el Mariscal expreso su conviccion de que todos los veteranos, siendo excelentes predecesores de la revolucion y educadores quienes inculcan el espiritu de defensa a ultranza a la patria en las filas de los continuadores quienes marchan a pasos firmes hacia la victoria definitiva de la Revolucion Coreana, les entregaran a estos las preciosas riquezas ideo-espirituales y haran gran aporte a armarlos con el espiritu de defensa a la patria.
					
					Participaron en la filmacion Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil, Ri Ul Sol, Hwang Sun Hui, Kim Chol Man, Pak Kyong Suk, Ri Yong Suk, Yang Hyong Sop, Ri Yong Mu, O Kuk Ryol, Choe Yong Rim y Thae Jong Su.

articles.title: EE.UU. debe mostrar su "voluntad de dialogo", insiste MINREX
articles.content:
EE.UU. debe mostrar su "voluntad de dialogo", insiste MINREX 
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea (ACNC) formulada en relacion con que Estados Unidos intenta imputar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea las responsabilidades del dialogo suspendido sobre el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC respondio el dia 29 como sigue:
					Durante la visita al Sur de Corea y otros paises realizada desde el dia 25, el enviado especial de las conversaciones a 6 bandas del Departamento de Estado norteamericano difundio la opinion publica como si el dialogo entre ambas partes no se logra por culpa de la RPDC diciendo que esta tiene antipatia al dialogo con puerta abierta por EE.UU. y que su pais se enfrentara flexiblemente con la RPDC si esta tiene la decision de tomar otro camino 
					
					Como estan conocidos por todos, la causa de que en la Peninsula Coreana perdura la permanente tension en vez del dialogo reside en la politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC y, sobre todo, en los agresivos e incesantes ejercicios conjuntos militares.
					
					Por tanto, si EE.UU. toma la decision de abandonar los actos hostiles inclusive los ejercicios militares conjuntos y toma la decision de tomar otro camino habra la posibilidad de las conversaciones y podran solucionarse muchos problemas.
					
					EE.UU. dispara los fusiles y canones, por una parte y por la otra, habla de la "voluntad de dialogo" y la "flexibilidad", lo cual no es otro, sino la extremidad del descaro y la hipocresia.
					
					Esto no pasa de ser una ardid de EE.UU. para evadir la crisis transfiriendo la responsabilidad del dialogo ante las censuras que se tornan mas fuertes por el fracaso de la politica hacia la RPDC de la administracion de Obama
					
					Antes de que EE.UU. muestra la sinceridad de la "voluntad del dialogo" poniendo fin a los ejercicios militares, continuara el circulo vicioso de la agravacion de la situacion y no se realizara el dialogo.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC denuncia sofisteria de "trafico de seres humanos" de EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC denuncia sofisteria de "trafico de seres humanos" de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea formulada en relacion con que en estos dias, Estados Unidos volvio a disparatear sobre el inexistente trafico de seres humanos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de esta dio el dia 29 siguiente  respuesta:
					Enumerando la situacion del trafico de seres humanos de varios paises en el informe sobre el "trafico de seres humanos de 2015" publicado el dia 27, el Departamento de Estado norteamericano, califico la RPDC de "pais origen de trafico de seres humanos" y que esta no se esfuerza por  prevenirlo. Insatisfecho con esto, difamo perversamente la prestigiosa RPDC presentando al igual que en el pasado los datos inventados tales como el trabajo forzoso y el campo de concentracion.
					
					EE.UU., caudillo de violacion de derechos humanos y mayor traficante de seres humanos en el mundo, acusa absurdamente a la RPDC con el inexistente "problema de derechos humanos" como si fuera "juez de derechos humanos", lo que es una muestra intensiva de la politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					Nadie prestara oidos a tales disparates de EE.UU.
					
					Al ver fracasada la intencion militar de atentar a la RPDC, EE.UU. divulga sin cesar los documentos intrigantes a fin de aislarla internacionalmente valiendose de los metodos sucios y  realizar sin falta la ambicion de derrocarla.
					
					Es una burla e insulto insoportables para nosotros el hecho de que EE.UU. arma alboroto con el "trafico de seres humanos" de la RPDC, donde siendo dueno del pais, el pueblo disfruta a sus anchas de los derechos independientes y realiza sus suenos e ideales hermosos.
					
					Cuanto mas se haga abierta la intencion de EE.UU. de derrocar nuestro regimen, mas se centuplicara la voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de defender el regimen socialista tomando mas firmemente como espada omnipotente la politica del Songun y la linea de desarrollo paralelo.

articles.title: Rim Hyon Su confesa sus complots anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Rim Hyon Su confesa sus complots anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este jueves en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo una entrevista de prensa con Rim Hyon Su, pastor coreano residente en Canada, detenido por sus intrigas de derrocamiento a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					A la cita asistieron los periodistas del pais y de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon), los corresponsales extranjeros, los miembros de las representaciones diplomaticas en la RPDC, los coreanos residentes en el ultramar quienes permanecen en la patria socialista.
					
					El organo competente de Corea desenmascaro y detuvo al pastor Rim Hyon Su, lacayo de los imperialistas yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos, quien al visitar en varias ocasiones durante 18 anos pasados a la RPDC bajo el pretexto del "asistencia humanitaria" y la "donacion gratuita", calumnio con mala intencion la maxima dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC y perpetro abiertamente los complots para derrocar la RPDC a fin de levantar un Estado religioso en este territorio.
					
					En el proceso de averiguacion del organo competente Rim reconocio todos sus crimenes.
					
					En la entrevista Rim Hyon Su fue primero en pronunciar. 
					
					En febrero pasado, entro ilegalmente en la ciudad de Pyongyang por via de la ciudad de Rason violando las medidas emergentes de la RPDC para la prevencion de virus de Ebola y ahora esta en la investigacion juridica.
					
					Al visitar la RPDC bajo el rotulo de la "ayuda humanitaria", "donacion gratuita" y "cooperacion", nego y difamo la dignidad y el sistema de la RPDC y atento contra la RPDC bajo la instigacion de EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas. 
					
					Trabajando como pastor encargado de la Iglesia Rayos Dorados, desacredito la dignidad y el sistema de la RPDC en las predicas dominicales. Tambien, lo hizo mediante el "informe de trabajo en el Norte de Corea" ante decenas de miles de surcoreanos y compatriotas en mas de 20 paises y regiones como Estados Unidos, el Sur de Corea, Japon y Brasil.
					
					Infundio la hostilidad a la RPDC en las predicas y conferencias concedidas en los mitines religiosos de distintos tipos incluyendo "Kimnet", organizacion conjunta de los lideres de las iglesias y las entidades misioneras de los coreanos en America del Norte, insistiendo en que "hay que derrocar con el amor de Dios al Norte de Corea.
					
					Ha desarrollado constantes actividades religiosas anti-RPDC para debilitar la veneracion al lider guardada en el corazon de los moradores norcoreanos y desintegrar y derribar desde adentro este pais socialista.
					
					  Hizo dibujar intencionalmente la cruz en las bolsas de cereales que se "donan" a varios lugares de la RPDC y en unas ocasiones envio las bolas con las inscripciones del nombre de la iglesia y los parrafos de la Biblia. 
					
					Bajo el pretexto de la "ayuda" de varios tipos dio vueltas por muchas partes de la RPDC con el objetivo de acondicionar las bases favorables a derrumbar el sistema norcoreano y levantar un Estado religioso en adhesion a la politica de aplastamiento anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Con los datos falsificados y demagogia infundio la desconfianza y la hostilidad a la RPDC en los creyentes y la sociedad de compatriotas. 
					
					Entrego a su hijo las fotografias sacadas a escondidas en la RPDC y elaboro los videos y otros datos de propaganda intrigante bajo el tema de "Realidad del Norte de Corea" para explicarlo ante los religiosos o insertarlo en la pagina web. 
					
					En 2007 fotografio a hurtadillas la vieja Biblia y el libro de canticos de So Kye Ok, compatriota residente en EE.UU. y falto la verdad como si lo fuera coleccionado entre los norcoreanos religiosos.
					
					En el encuentro con el embajador norteamericano en Mongolia, sostenido en 1996, discutio el problema para lograr cada ano la fuga de mas de 500 habitantes norcoreanos por via de Mongolia al Sur de Corea y en el aeropuerto de Beijing entrego a un intermediario coreano el aparato de GPS en que esta fijado un lugar fronterizo de Mongolia Interior de China, recibido por Dennis Kim de nacionalidad norteamericana que se entregaba de la guia de los fugitivos norcoreanos.
					
					Durante 2 anos desde 1996 invirtio cada ano una suma de dinero del presupuesto de la iglesia como gastos de asistencia a los "fugitivos norcoreanos" y envio a Jon Jong Sok, creyente coreano en Canada a Yanji y Tumen de la provincia de Jilin de China para conducir la fuga de habitantes norcoreanos. 
					
					Rim reconocio francamente que todos sus crimenes son los de derrocamiento de Estado. 
					
					A continuacion, Rim respondio a las preguntas.
					
					El aclaro los detalles de haber sometido a la supervision y detenido por el organismo judicial de la RPDC y revelo la crueldad y la falsedad de los complots anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Segun su testimonio, EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas movilizan a los politicos, los conspiradores, los medios de prensa y hasta la via Internet para cuestionar el "problema nuclear" y el de "derechos humanos" de la RPDC y la calumnia como "proliferante de armas de exterminio masivo", "preocupante del lavado de dinero" y "fabricante de armas biologicas".
					
					El "informe del Comite de Investigacion de DDHH del Norte de la ONU" es un documento falso inventado con los testigos mentirosos de Sin Tong Hyok y otros tipejos que se huyeron de la RPDC por haber cometido los crimenes intolerables. 
					
					Y sobornan a los "especialistas" en los asuntos norcoreanos para que estos echen las maldiciones anti-RPDC de toda indole. 
					
					Estados Unidos y sus satelites y las autoridades surcoreanas impiden estrictamente la entrada de los articulos de uso civil, un grano de cereales y un gramo de abono en la RPDC.
					
					Rim revelo las entidades religiosas y los personajes que se dedican a la propaganda demagogica y los complots anti-RPDC  obedeciendo a los Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos y reflexiono sobre su delincuencia diciendo que sus crimenes se deben a erronea comprension sobre la RPDC.

articles.title: Capitalinos responden al llamamiento de los veteranos
articles.content:
Capitalinos responden al llamamiento de los veteranos
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 30 en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin multitudinario de los capitalinos para responder al llamamiento de los participantes en la IV Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos a todos los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, habitantes y jovenes.
					  Asistieron al conclave Choe Thae Bok, Kwak Pom Gi, los vicepremieres, los funcionarios de los ministerios y organos centrales, los de las instituciones del partido y administracion, entidades de masas, organismos, fabricas, empresas y granjas de esta capital, los heroes, los ameritados y las masas de distintos estratos.
					
					  El secretario-jefe del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Kim Su Gil, dio lectura al llamamiento de los participantes en IV Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos.
					
					  Luego, pronunciaron discursos de juramento los representantes de los obreros, trabajadores agricolas, jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					  Los oradores subrayaron que mostraran el impetu heroico y el coraje del ciudadano capitalino en la batalla de confrontacion antiyanqui y la ofensiva general para la victoria final de la construccion de Estado prospero sucediendo la conviccion revolucionaria y el espiritu de defensa a la patria de los veteranos de guerra.
					
					  Apuntaron que guardando profundamente en el corazon la conviccion firme de que por contar con el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, se realizaran sin falta la causa de la reunificacion de la patria y la de la construccion de Estado prospero, defenderan a costa de la vida el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y crearan la epopeya heroica de la gran epoca Kim Jong Un y el mito de nueva victoria de la Corea del Songun con los exitos orgullosos de la produccion y la construccion.
					
					  Dijeron que pondran de pleno manifiesto el espiritu de la defensa a la patria y el indoblegable impetu de lucha de la decada de 1950 en todas ramas de la construccion de la potencia economica considerando sus puestos y lugares de trabajo como el frente del rio Rakdong y la cota 1211.
					
					  Destacaron que seran baluarte inexpugnable y escudos que defienden con la vida al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, destino y futuro del pueblo coreano como los soldados de guardia de corps que defendieron a ultranza al Comandante Supremo en medio del bombardeo intenso de los enemigos en los dias de guerra.
					
					  Enfatizaron que si el Mariscal da orden aniquilaran completamente siendo balas y bombas humanas a los invasores sin dejar ni un yanqui que puede firmar el acta de capitulacion.
